content: निर्णिज् {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To wash, clean, purify; <ls>R. 17. 22</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 191</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 127.</ls> {@--2@} To dress oneself.
निर्णिज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Clearing, washing. {@--2@} Well-nourished. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A form, shape. {@--2@} A bright or shining garment. {@--3@} Purification, washing.
